name: Prey Tell
description:
You are a fox on the hunt for your next meal. You're in a secluded field hoping to catch some rabbits, but there are some gruesome bears nearby hoping to catch you!

This is a short first-person game with the simple goal of catching all of the rabbits you can before you starve. I made it in a couple weeks in the hopes of actually finishing a project for once. Although this game could use a good deal of polish I'm opting to release it as is. I hope you enjoy!

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

Mouse to look left and right

Hold space to look above the grass

While you're moving forward your head will bounce up and down 

Tap E when your head is at its lowest point to get a speed boost

The white line at the center bottom indicates how loud you are being

The white circle at the center bottom indicates if you're hidden in the grass or not

Bears and rabbits use sight and sound to locate you

Touching a rock will alert all animals to your location

You refill your hunger bar by eating rabbits

To find rabbits, look for bouncing grass or look for their scent

A rabbit's scent will start to appear if you get very hungry

Eat all rabbits to win

An empty hunger bar means you lose

A bear touching you means you lose

--------------------------------------------------------------

Special thanks to millionfish for help with art and sounds effects!
